thread.title: 2 Chinese diplomats shot dead in Philippines
thread.title_full: 2 Chinese diplomats shot dead in Philippines | News24

author: news24.com
title: 2 Chinese diplomats shot dead in Philippines
text:
Manila - Two Chinese diplomats were killed and a third was injured in a gun attack at a restaurant in the central Philippine city of Cebu on Wednesday, police said.
The deputy consul and the finance officer for the Chinese consulate in Cebu were killed, and the consul general was wounded, national police spokesperson Wilben Mayor told AFP in a text message.
Two Chinese were arrested following the attack, one of whom is the husband of a diplomat at the consulate, Mayor said.
The other person arrested was a woman who also worked at the embassy, according to Mayor.
